name: Coding Standards Enforcement Hook
description: Enforces coding standards before file creation and modification

actions.request:
Before creating or modifying files, refresh your knowledge on coding standards:
1. Only one class per file
2. No classes should be named the same system-wide
3. Check if the functionality exists before creating the functionality
4. Database entities must have their primary key in the format {{tableName}}Id, such as the "Booking" table's primary key would be "BookingId"
5. We never use Automapper, use Mapperly if you want to use a mapping library
6. For design, the site has to use the layout and theme as described in the style_guide.md file
7. For project context, read the relevant .md file targeted to the piece of work you're currently doing

Please review the file being created/modified and ensure it follows these standards. If violations are found, suggest corrections.
